description: Research and analyze quarterly earnings reports for top tech stocks

userStories.title: Setup earnings data directory structure
acceptanceCriteria: Create earnings_data/ directory
Create subdirectory for each ticker (AAPL/, MSFT/, etc.)
Create transcripts/ subdirectory in each ticker folder
Initialize empty calendar.json file

userStories.title: Fetch earnings calendar and dates
acceptanceCriteria: Use web search to find upcoming earnings dates for each ticker
Check Yahoo Finance, Nasdaq, or earnings calendars
Save to earnings_data/calendar.json
Include: ticker, date, time (BMO/AMC), estimated EPS
userStories.notes: Sources: Yahoo Finance earnings calendar, Nasdaq earnings

userStories.title: Collect historical earnings data
acceptanceCriteria: For each ticker, gather last 4 quarters of earnings
Include: EPS estimate, EPS actual, surprise %, revenue, guidance
Save to earnings_data/{TICKER}/earnings_history.json
Include stock price reaction on earnings day
userStories.notes: Use Yahoo Finance historical data, Seeking Alpha

userStories.title: Fetch earnings call transcripts
acceptanceCriteria: For each ticker, find last 2 earnings call transcripts
Save as text files in earnings_data/{TICKER}/transcripts/
Filename format: YYYY_QN.txt (e.g., 2025_Q4.txt)
Include prepared remarks and Q&A sections
userStories.notes: Sources: Seeking Alpha, Motley Fool, company IR pages

userStories.title: Analyze individual ticker earnings trends
acceptanceCriteria: For each ticker, analyze earnings history
Calculate: beat rate, average surprise, revenue trend
Identify key themes from transcripts
Generate earnings_data/{TICKER}/analysis.md
userStories.notes: Focus on patterns, risks, and opportunities

userStories.title: Create sector comparison analysis
acceptanceCriteria: Compare all tickers across key metrics
Rank by: EPS growth, revenue growth, beat consistency
Identify sector trends and themes
Save to earnings_data/sector_comparison.json

userStories.title: Generate investment insights report
acceptanceCriteria: Compile all analysis into final report
Include: summary, top picks, risks, upcoming catalysts
Provide actionable insights for each ticker
Save to earnings_data/investment_report.md
